details: Has applied for a Common Victualler License to be exercised on the above : Two rooms on the ground floor with an open concept kitchen. Storage in the back and restroom for employees only.

Holder of a Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned to amend the description of the licensed business - From: In one room on ground floor with various seating areas, two (2) bars, kitchen and restrooms, and private dining areas in separate room on ground floor; storage and office space in rear. To: In one room on ground floor with various seating areas, two (2) bars, kitchen and restrooms, and private dining areas in separate room on ground floor; storage and office space in rear; together with seasonal (April-November) outdoor patio on private property with 24 seats and an 11:00PM outdoor closing hour.

Holder of a Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned to amend the description of the licensed business - From In one floor, with dining room in two rooms, kitchen in one room, office in one room, and storage. Seasonal (April-October) outdoor patio on private property accessible by two private entrances/exits with midnight closing hour. To: In one floor, with dining room in two rooms, kitchen in one room, office in one room, and storage. Seasonal (April-October) outdoor patio on private property accessible by two private entrances/exits with midnight closing hour along Harrison Avenue and Traveler Street, with seating for 25 persons; additional seasonal (April-October) outdoor patio on private property between 360 Harrison Avenue and 350 Harrison Avenue, with additional seating for 42, and midnight closing hour. Indoor closing hour 2:00AM.

Holder of a Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned to amend the description of the licensed business  From: Tenant space "D" in one (1) room with dining area, bar, kitchen, storage, two (2) street level entrances and three (3) street level exits with seasonal patio (April-October), on private property with 11pm closing hour on the patio. To: Tenant space "D" in one (1) room with dining area, bar, kitchen, storage, two (2) street level entrances and three (3) street level exits. Seasonal patio (April-October) on private property with 12:00AM closing hour and 20 seats along Harrison Avenue; additional seasonal (April-October) outdoor patio on private property between 360 Harrison Avenue and 350 Harrison Avenue, with additional seating for 42 and a kiosk service bar with 8 seats, and 12:00AM closing hour. Indoor closing hour 2:00AM.

Holder of a Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned to amend the description of the licensed business  From: Approximately 14,573 square feet on two floors. The first floor will be a foyer entrance with no service consisting of approximately 1,105 square feet. The second floor will be the remaining 13,468 square feet with six rooms, Kitchen, Bar, Dinning, Storage, and Restrooms (2). There are 4 entrances/exits, the main entrance on the first floor, employee entrance in the rear of the kitchen, emergency exit in the dining room, and an entrance in the bar from the lobby of the main building. To: Tuscan Kitchen will consist of approx. 14,573SF on two (2) floors. The first floor will be a small cocktail bar consisting of approx. 1,105SF. The second floor will house the remaining 13,468SF with 6 rooms, kitchen, bar, dining, storage, and restrooms (2). There are 4 entrances/exits, the main entrance on the first floor, employee entrance in the rear of the kitchen, emergency exit in the dining room, and an entrance in the bar from the lobby of the main building. There is an approx. 600SF Private, seasonal outdoor patio (weather dependent, March - November) with a seating capacity of 14. Hours of operation would be the same as indoor dining.

status_detail: The Board also granted the issuance of a temporary Common Victualler License pending
details: Holder of a Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned to transfer the license from the above - To: American Multi-Cinema, Inc. dba AMC Theaters (at the same location). Samuel Muchiri, Manager. 2:00 AM Closing Hour. Secondly, has petitioned to update the description of premise From: On four floors, first floor to be licensed One Room with two entrances and exits, (2547 SF), Second Floor Mezzanine One Room with Two Entrances and Exits (5382 SF), Second Floor with Six Auditoriums, Concession Area, Lobby and storage areas (26116 SF), Third Floor with Nine Auditoriums, Concession Area, Lobby and storage areas, (36422 SF). Total SF = 71467. To: Premise located at 100 Legends Way AKA 60 Causeway Street. On four floors, first floor to be licensed One Room with two entrances and exits, (2547 SF), Second Floor Mezzanine One Room with Two Entrances and Exits (5382 SF), Second Floor with Six Auditoriums, Concession Area, Lobby and storage areas (26116 SF), Third Floor with Nine Auditoriums, Concession Area, Lobby and storage areas, (36422 SF). Total SF = 71467.

Holder of a Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned to transfer the license from the above - To: Savr Restaurant, LLC dba Savr Restaurant (at the same location). David Doyle, Manager. 12:00 AM Closing Hour. Secondly, has petitioned to amend the description of premise From: Two rooms, kitchen and outdoor patio on the first floor; two rooms on the first floor for stock. One room on the mezzanine level, and to include an outdoor patio on the roof. CAPACITY BREAKDOWN: 1ST FL INSIDE - 326; 1ST FL OUTSIDE - 28; 2ND FL INSIDE - 39; 2ND FL OUTSIDE - 154. To: Venue located at 150 Seaport Blvd AKA 150 Northern Ave. consisting of 10,290SF. Two floors with a mezzanine for stock. 1st floor; Seating for 130(two bar/dining areas: Bar 1- seating for 27, lounge dining for 14, bar dining for 8, General Dining for 29, cocktail lounge for 4 and private annual patio to close a 10pm with capacity of 48 patrons). 2nd Floor; 2 dining areas for 159 people ( bar for 9, bar dining 14, dining area #1 for 18, dining area #2 for 36, private dining room for 14, cocktail lounge for 4 and outside private annual patio to consist of 64 patrons with a 10PM patio closing). Hours of operation 11AM to 12AM Mon-Sat. 10AM-12AM Sunday. Lastly has petitioned to Pledge the License to Northern Bank and Trust Company.

Holder of a Common Victualler 7 Day Wines and Malt Beverages License has petitioned to transfer the license and the location from the above  To: JTBC, Inc. dba Jiang Nan located at 177 Tremont Street, Boston, MA 02111. Premise consists of 3000SF: one room on first floor with kitchen in rear with 118 table seats and 8 bar seats; bathrooms, storage and employee areas in basement. Closing hour 1:00AM. So Lim Ting, Manager. Secondly, has petitioned to change the category of its license To: Wines, Malt Beverages and Liqueurs pursuant to the authority contained in Chapter 481 of the Acts of 1994. Lastly, has petitioned to Pledge the License to New Valley Bank & Trust.

Holder of a Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned to transfer the license and the location from the above  To: G&V Ice Cream and Sub Inc. dba Don't Tell Aunty located at 1122 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02215. The premises consists of a restaurant on ground floor containing approx. 1,500SF in two rooms with dining area seating for 48 patrons, bar area seating for 5 patrons, kitchen in rear. Basement storage containing approx. 1,500SF. Closing hour 2:00AM. Niral Patel, Manager. Lastly, has petitioned to Pledge the License to Rockland Trust Company. Attorney: Jon D. Aieta

status_detail: The Board also granted the issuance of a temporary Common Victualler License pending
details: Holder of a Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned to transfer the license and the location from the above  To: Legends Music LLC located at 800 Boylston, Boston, MA 02199. The premises consist of: 3-story observation deck on the 50th, 51st and 52nd floors of the Prudential Tower. All levels of the attract are intended to be utilized in conjunction with food and beverage operations including full-service restaurants (50th) cocktail bar and outdoor deck (51st) and special event space on each level. Closing Hour 2:00AM. Justin Rink, Manager. Granted

Has applied for a Farmer Brewery (Malt Beverages Only) Pouring License to be exercised on the above - First floor facility with two exits. Taproom and brewery are separated by a masonry wall. Taproom contains one room with two grades - higher grade is accessible via stairs and elevator. There are (5) accessible bathrooms. Taproom is approximately 3,625 square feet. Brewery contains one major room, mechanical room and small office. Brewery is approximately 2,500 square feet.

address: 10 Old Colony Av., South Boston, MA 02127

Has applied for an (Airport) Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License to be exercised on the above  GACHI SUSHI and NOODLES is located at Boston Logan Airport Terminal C Space CB2-A10C, 917 sqft, one floor, Post Security Gate, no Outdoor area . This is a private seating restaurant and not a food court or part of a food court. It has a sushi counter with some bar stools and sushi chef making sushi behind the front counter and also has some tables with chairs for 27 at the dining room .

status_detail: Granted, pending the availability of a license for which the applicant qualifies
details: Has applied for a Common Victualler 7 Day Wines and Malt Beverages License to be exercised on the above  3,120SF gross area. Interior dining only; the indoor dining area will measure approx. 1,271SF with 88 seats. There is no bar seating at the location. The premise will be equipped with an on-site kitchen.
